ygData.subject: Re: RE: Any one Know where Lord Grimlot in Neriak Is?
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone on this list gave the Lute to Lord Grimlot, he said thanks and equiped the Lute, then they killed him to get it back.  BTW what he wants is Arelena s
ygData.messageBody:
Someone on this list gave the Lute to Lord Grimlot, he said thanks and
equiped the Lute, then they killed him to get it back. BTW what he wants is
Arelena's (sp?) Bones, NOT the Lute. I know this for a fact, as one of my
other characters (a Human Necromancer) got this quest from him.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
